branchCategory.name: LEC-G
branchCategory.description: LEC-G is a Fieldbus-compatible Gateway (GW) unit for electric actuators.  Protocols include CC-Link Ver. 2.0, DeviceNet™, PROFIBUS DP, and EtherNet/IP™.  Cables and branch connectors are available for connecting up to 12 controllers, depending on the selected protocol.

branchItem.name: LEC-G, Gateway Unit
